## ScaleDropdown variable

Represents a Fluent dropdown of Thematic scale options. The scale names can be accompanied by a visual rendering of the scale colors. This bascially extends Dropdown, overriding the options and item rendering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ScaleDropdown: FC<ScaleDropdownProps>
```
